articles.title: GLOBAL MARKETS-Stocks drop as new coronavirus fears escalate
articles.description: Shares slid on Monday as investors shunned equities on growing concerns over the scope of a China virus outbreak, with safe-haven assets such as the Japanese yen and Treasury notes in greater demand.
articles.content:
TOKYO (Reuters) - Shares slid on Monday as investors shunned equities on growing concerns over the scope of a China virus outbreak, with safe-haven assets such as the Japanese yen and Treasury notes in greater demand.

articles.title: China's Shantou city to ban cars, ships, people from entering from Jan 27
articles.description: China's coastal city of Shantou in Guangdong province, said on Sunday it would ban cars, ships and people from entering the city starting from Jan. 27 to help prevent the spread of a coronavirus that broke out in Wuhan at end-2019.
articles.content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - China’s coastal city of Shantou in Guangdong province, said on Sunday it would ban cars, ships and people from entering the city starting from Jan. 27 to help prevent the spread of a coronavirus that broke out in Wuhan at end-2019.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: French car maker Peugeot to repatriate staff from China's Wuhan area
articles.description: French automotive group PSA, maker of the Peugeot and Citroen brands, said in a statement it will repatriate expat staff and their families from the Wuhan area in China, which is at the centre of an outbreak of coronavirus.
articles.content:
PARIS (Reuters) - French automotive group PSA, maker of the Peugeot and Citroen brands, said in a statement it will repatriate expat staff and their families from the Wuhan area in China, which is at the centre of an outbreak of coronavirus. 
It said that 38… [+315 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: U.S. says to evacuate consulate staff, some U.S. citizens from Wuhan
articles.description: The U.S. State Department said on Sunday it will relocate personnel at its Wuhan consulate to the United States and will offer a limited number of seats to private U.S. citizens on a flight out of the epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content: BEIJING (Reuters) - The U.S. State Department said on Sunday it will relocate personnel at its Wuhan consulate to the United States and will offer a limited number of seats to private U.S. citizens on a flight out of the epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak.… [+312 chars]

articles.title: Hong Kong Disneyland and Ocean Park to be closed from Sunday to help prevent spread of virus: CCTV
articles.description: Hong Kong's popular amusement parks Disneyland and Ocean Park are closed from Jan. 26 to help prevent the spread of a deadly coronavirus that broke out in the Chinese city Wuhan, state media CCTV reported on Sunday.
articles.content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - Hong Kong’s popular amusement parks Disneyland and Ocean Park are closed from Jan. 26 to help prevent the spread of a deadly coronavirus that broke out in the Chinese city Wuhan, state media CCTV reported on Sunday.

articles.title: China's Tianjin city to shut all inter-province buses to curb virus outbreak: state media
articles.description: China's northern city of Tianjin will shut all inter-province shuttle buses from Jan. 27 in order to curb the coronavirus outbreak, the official People's Daily reported on Sunday.
articles.content:

articles.title: China's Hubei province reports 13 new coronavirus deaths: state media
articles.description: China's central Hubei province, at the center of the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak, reported 13 new deaths caused by the new virus on Jan. 25, state media CCTV reported on Sunday.
articles.content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - China’s central Hubei province, at the center of the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak, reported 13 new deaths caused by the new virus on Jan. 25, state media CCTV reported on Sunday.

articles.title: Death toll from coronavirus outbreak in China at 56: state media
